Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Boston in 1973...
Injured on 7/28/1980 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/22/1980 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 9/1/1980, off Bill Slayback (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1980, off Antonio Pollorena (CAL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 4/27/1981...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1981, hitting .533 with 0 HR, 2 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1983, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1983, hitting .389 with 4 HR, 20 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 8/16/1983...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 10/2/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1984, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/3/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Injured on 8/17/1987 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/6/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
